name: TG_Files Rename Bot
description: A Very Simple Telegram Files Rename Bot by @grayhathacker676

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @telegramOrg_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @telegramOrg_Bot

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB Database URI for Saving UserID for Broadcast

DOWNLOAD_DIR.description: Files download path. You can keep default. Should not end with '/'

BROADCAST_AS_COPY.description: Broadcast as Copy or with Forward Tag. Value should be True/False.
